titles.title: Commending the Minority Business Development Agency for its history of achievement in helping to create minority businesses enterprises and in helping those enterprises effectively compete in the national and global marketplace.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Financial Services, and in addition to the Committee on Small Business, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Domestic Monetary Policy, Technology and Economic Growth.

committee.subcommittee: Domestic Monetary Policy, Technology, and Economic Growth
committee.name: House Financial Services

bill.summary: 10/10/2002--Introduced. Commends the Minority Business Development Agency for its achievements in helping to create minority business enterprises and in helping those enterprises effectively compete in the national and global marketplace.Encourages the Agency to continue its efforts to assist minority business enterprises.
